EmailTemplate.name: VHM - Webcast Recording
EmailTemplate.subject: Transforming IT Infrastructure for the Cloud Age
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Transforming IT Infrastructure for the Cloud Age
How to Deliver Real-Time Automation & Hyperscale Operations <http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-opensky-orchestration-webinar-full?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wcast> {{lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}, We love webinars <http://vmturbo.com/resources/#webinars?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wcast>, they're informative, quick, and far superior to reading. In fact we love them so much that we want to share them with you! Join OpenSky's Don McKeith to learn how he helped a Fortune 50 International Health Insurer client develop a ground-up orchestration framework for its virtual infrastructure, and onboard more than 25,000 zero-downtime VDI seats in less than four years. How quickly could {{company.company name:default=your company}} scale if the business called for it? Watch here to glean insights for your team directly from Mr. McKeith. See, webinars are awesome! Watch <http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-opensky-orchestration-webinar-full?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wcast> Now <http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-opensky-orchestration-webinar-full?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wcast> <http://www.vmturbo.com/downloads/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wcast> <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wcast> <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wcast> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
